Description: Fragment of a rock crystal bead with the remains of bored holes.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Sanctuary of Apollo (Naukratis), Stratum AΠ4 ('bothros' / 'trench with bowls') (Attributed by Petrie to the 'first temple of Apollo'.)
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (QJ.19)
